name: Fishing Rival 3D
description:
It’s time to go fishing! Journey to the world's most beautiful destinations and fish for real in Fishing Rival, the fantastic fishing simulator game everybody’s talking about! Enjoy 1v1 real-time duels, join PvP fishing tournaments and become a master of fishing!

Fishing Rival 3D is an addictive and challenging fishing game where you’ll feel like you’re on an actual fishing trip. Play this amazing fishing game and feel like a real angler in the realistic 3D world! Compete with others in live events, earn rewards, upgrade your rods and master your fishing skills in the quest to be the Fishing King!

Fishing Master Features:
- Realistic 3D physics for a perfect fishing simulation
- Revolutionary fishing system that’s easy to learn but difficult to master
- Dozens of realistic, beautifully animated fishing locations
- Hundreds of exotic fish native to different fishing spots
- Unlock new equipments and fishing tackles to win fishing duels
- Jaw-dropping 3D Graphics with stunning views
